entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
